item.title: How to load JSON data in PostgreSQL速?
item.description: PostgreSQL速 offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB. This doc showcases how to load JSON data into a column.

item.title: How to index and query a JSON object in PostgreSQL速?
item.description: PostgreSQL速 offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB. This doc showcases how to index a JSONB column with a GIN index.

item.title: How to query remote InfluxDB via cURL
item.description: Sometimes you want to query a remote InfluxDB server to understand the data in it. This can be done via cURL as explained in the InfluxDB docs
